result.eng: My money was leaving me fast.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.orig: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.html: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid airgid ag imeaċt uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.
